title: Kamloops
summary: Kamloops (/ˈkæmluːps/ KAM-lew-PSS) is a city in south-central British Columbia, Canada, at the confluence of the two branches of the Thompson River and east of Kamloops Lake. It is located in the Thompson-Nicola Regional District, whose district offices are based here.  The surrounding region is more commonly referred to as the Thompson Country.
